page.title: 19Trade
page.content: Trade in Ilford is very good. There are lots of different kinds of shops, although there are too many shoe shops.There are newsagents, clothes stores, department stores, building societies,banks, grocers,sports shops and electrical stores. We really need more petrol stations and department stores rather than so many food stores. There is a lot of building going on in Ilford at the moment, so there will be a lot of new shops. There is a new Sainsbury's under construction which will be finished in 1986. Several shops that have closed are due to open again under a new name. Ilford is going to be made into a traffic free shopping centre. Plans have been drawn up and some construction work is already under way.
